name: Donquixote Doflamingo
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
On Play DON!!:3: Choose one:
• If your Leader has the (Donquixote Pirates) type, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 8 or less.
• Up to 3 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn.
